LAGU.text: Bonaparte's Gulls are substantially smaller than Laughing Gulls.

FRGU.text: Bonaparte's Gulls are substantially smaller than Franklin's Gulls.
The eye rings on Bonaparte's Gulls are noticeably smaller than on Franklin's Gulls.

LAGU.text: Laughing Gulls have more extensive black on the head than Bonaparte's Gulls.
Bonaparte's bills are nearly black and thin. Laughing Gulls have larger, reddish bills.

FRGU.text: Bonaparte's bills are nearly black. Franklin's Gull bills are a deep red.

LAGU.text: Bonaparte's Gulls have a distinctive thin white triangle on upper-wings' outer primaries. Laughing Gulls wings are medium gray with somewhat extensive black on the wing tips.

FRGU.text: Bonaparte's Gulls have a distinctive thin white triangle on upper-wings' outer primaries. Franklin's Gulls have black wing tips separated from the grey inner wing by extensive white.

LAGU.text: Bonaparte's Gull legs are light pink. Laughing Gull legs are dark reddish-black.

FRGU.text: Bonaparte's Gull legs are light pink. Franklin's Gull legs are reddish-black.
